mapper.select: SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT notice_no, notice_title FROM notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC) R WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT question_Id, question_Title FROM question ORDER BY question_Id DESC) R WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT findStu_Id, findStu_Title FROM findStu ORDER BY findstu_Id DESC) R WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT findPro_Id, findPro_Title FROM findPro ORDER BY findPro_Id DESC) R WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT life_Id, life_Title FROM life ORDER BY life_Id DESC) R WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
